briefdescription.para: Gets the number of players in area.

simplesect.para: The player count for the area.

briefdescription.para: Gets the creature that last entered area.

simplesect.para: The most recent creature to enter the area.

briefdescription.para: Gets the creature that last left area.
Get the PVP setting of area.

simplesect.para: Returns the PVP Setting for the area.

briefdescription.para: Set the PVP setting of area.
Get the spot modifier of area.

simplesect.para: The value of the Spot skill modifier for this area.

briefdescription.para: Set the spot modifier of area.

parameterdescription.para: The modifier to the Spot skill for this area.

simplesect.para: NWNX_SkillRanks_SetAreaModifier() to change any skill modifier.

briefdescription.para: Get the listen modifer of area.

simplesect.para: The value of the Listen skill modifier for this area.

briefdescription.para: Set the listen modifier of area.

parameterdescription.para: The modifier to the Listen skill for this area.

simplesect.para: NWNX_SkillRanks_SetAreaModifier() to change any skill modifier.

briefdescription.para: Checks the No Resting area flag.

simplesect.para: TRUE if resting is not allowed in area.

briefdescription.para: Set whether to disable resting in the area.

parameterdescription.para: TRUE to disable resting in the area.

briefdescription.para: Get the wind power in area.

simplesect.para: The wind power for the area. (0-2)

briefdescription.para: Set the wind power in area.
Get the weather chance of type in area.

simplesect.para: The percentage chance for the weather type. (0-100)

briefdescription.para: Set the weather chance of type in area.

parameterdescription.para: The chance this weather event occurs.

briefdescription.para: Get the fog clip distance in area.
Set the fog clip distance in area.
Get the shadow opacity of area.

simplesect.para: The shadow opacity for the area. (0-100)

briefdescription.para: Set the shadow opacity of area.

parameterdescription.para: The shadow opacity to set for the area (0-100).

briefdescription.para: Get the day/night cycle of area.
Set the day/night cycle of area.
Get the Sun/Moon Ambient/Diffuse colors of area.

simplesect.para: A FOG_COLOR_* or a custom value, -1 on error.

briefdescription.para: Set the Sun/Moon Ambient/Diffuse colors of area.

simplesect.para:
The color can also be represented as a hex RGB number if specific color shades are desired. The format of a hex specified color would be 0xFFEEDD where
FF would represent the amount of red in the color
EE would represent the amount of green in the color
DD would represent the amount of blue in the color.

memberdef.argsstring: (object area, object target, float x, float y, float z, float size=2.0f, string tag="")
memberdef.name: NWNX_Area_CreateTransition

briefdescription.para: Create and returns a transition (square shaped of specified size) at a location.

parameterdescription.para: The position to create the transition.
If specified, the returning object will have this tag.

simplesect.para: NWNX_Object_SetTriggerGeometry() if you wish to draw the transition as something other than a square.

memberdef.argsstring: (object oArea, float fTileX, float fTileY, int nAnimLoop)
memberdef.name: NWNX_Area_GetTileAnimationLoop

briefdescription.para: Get the state of a tile animation loop.

simplesect.para: TRUE if the loop is enabled.

memberdef.argsstring: (object oArea, float fTileX, float fTileY, int nAnimLoop, int bEnabled)
memberdef.name: NWNX_Area_SetTileAnimationLoop

briefdescription.para: Set the state of a tile animation loop.

simplesect.para: Requires clients to re-enter the area for it to take effect

briefdescription.para: Functions exposing additional area properties as well as creating transitions.
